196002.name: Gods vs. Humans
196002.description:
Nothing is going right for the Gods: humans want to pay them a visit.
How can the Gods destroy the towers the humans are building, without losing their faith?
Found out for yourself, whilst subtly balancing intimidation and powers of seduction.
A fresh and original world which is sure to delight strategy
game fans.

Source: The Developer Website.

196003.name: Cornerstone: The Song of Tyrim
196003.description:
Cornerstone is an open world action adventure, with an emphasis on exploration and combat mixed with physics and player choice. A game inspired by TLOZ games and Dark souls.
The world is structured like Wind-Waker with a series of islands connected by a vast ocean, almost all areas are accessible from the start. The main method of transportation between islands will be by Ship (there will be fast travel).
We’re aiming for an art style that invokes a sense of wonder but at the same time has the ability to charm your socks off. Stylized geometry with simple textures but with realistic rendering, also inspired by the Viking culture.

Source: The Developer Website.

196004.name: Tooth and Claw
196004.description:
From publisher blurb:

Poisoned Pages for Shadow of the Demon Lord

We all wear masks. We wear them to conceal our true selves, to become what others expect us to be, navigating the murky waters of social interaction to forge relationships, find love, and avoid enemies. For most of us, masks conceal uncertainties and doubts, ambitions and desires, and all the little secrets that make up what we think of as our true selves. For a few, masks conceal darkness, a dangerous beast just barely restrained by the chains of self-control. Sometimes, the chains break, the mask slips, and the horror begins.

Skinchangers in Shadow of the Demon Lord encompass a variety of shapeshifting creatures, from werewolves to ratmen and everything in between. The animal form a skinchanger adopts can be anything you need it to be without having to alter anything other than how it’s described. For Game Masters, this approach provides a great deal of freedom, but from the perspective of players, especially those who contract the Skinchanger Curse, a bit more information can be helpful.

This entry into the Poisoned Pages series takes a closer look at skinchangers, revealing their secret origins, how they spread their curse, and everything else you need to know to play a skinchanger character. Unleash the beast inside you and bark at the moon!

196005.name: Young Character Options
196005.description:
From publisher blurb:

Be it on Platform 9-and-a-bit, or in the Land Beyond the Wardrobe, Adventure Awaits the Young!

Roleplaying children can be a surprisingly difficult task for adults as it frequently requires an unexpected level of maturity to play the immature. Difficulties can stem from the idea that children are chaotic little complications to the game.

Young Character Options provides a plethora of possibilities for playing younglings in your current campaign while detailing the various reasons why a child would not only be out adventuring, but how they could obtain the necessary abilities to do so. From young character traits (such as precocious, slippery, and unnoticed), young character feats (for prodigies), to young character archetypes(ageless, destined blade, reincarnated master, street rat, and wunderkund), Young Character Options is a must have.

196006.name: Jersey Devil
196006.description:
From publisher blurb:

WHO IS the Jersey Devil?!

As a child, Matilda Mangold was blinded by a chemical truck explosion when she risked herself to save the driver. Her father, a brilliant neurosurgeon, designed sensor horns to attempt to restore her sight, but instead affected all her other senses. For this unsanctioned surgery he was jailed, while others profited from his now-stolen research. Matilda never forgot the injustice. It drove her to study criminal investigation, and learn martial arts to ensure she’d never be unable to help someone close to her again.

After the formation of the Sentinels, and several massive battles with alien invaders and the villainous Overlords, New York and New Jersey suffered. Crime was on the rise and the police were overtasked. Inspired by the rise of costumed heroes, Matilda created a persona and now uses her impressive sensory powers to fight crime as the “Jersey Devil.” (PL 8)

Super Powered Legends. Because sometimes what you need is a character everyone will recognize, even if they’ve never met her.

196007.name: Dudefish: Episode 1 Squidsteen's Legacy
196007.description:
This is Dudefish, a fun 2D point and click adventure game. Follow the misadventures of Dudefish, a guy that suddenly wakes up as a fish. Find out why you are a fish and who made you that way. Discover a town filled with sea creatures in the same situation while trying to uncover the mystery of a dead founder called Squidsteen.

Source: The Developer Website.

196008.name: Offworld Trading Company
196008.description:
Offworld Trading Company is a real-time strategy game in which money, not military force, is the player's weapon. Players must stake their claims to resources, then extract and develop them into goods that are used for advanced buildings and upgrades – and bought and sold on the real-time, player-driven marketplace.

The marketplace is the core of Offworld Trading Company. Supply and demand are the only rules, and the player who can most effectively craft their strategy to buy low and sell high generally takes home the prize. Running steel mills without iron mines is perfectly possible, if you're willing to pay market price for iron to keep them fed – and it may even be a winning strategy, if iron is abundant and the market is flooded with it.

Along the way, players upgrade their headquarters to increase the number of tiles they can claim, and construct special buildings like the Patent Office that have wide-ranging gameplay effects. Though direct conflict is not possible – you'll never send space marines into an enemy base – a variety of skulduggery is available on the black market. It isn't cheap to pay someone to smuggle an EMP into a rival base, or pirates to raid a competitor's supply line, but it can be extremely effective.

Ultimately, accumulating the capital needed to build an orbit-capable launch facility and thereby access to astoundingly lucrative offworld markets drives the endgame. The player who can buy up the shares of every rival gains dominance over the Martian market for good.

Source: The Game Website.

196009.name: The Ravager (Hybrid Class)
196009.description:
From publisher blurb:

Born of Fire and Ice, the Ravager is a new hybrid class that combines the wild aspects of the ranger and combine it with the superstitious magics of the witch. Relying on his bonded animal companion through a connection forged from a dark pact from one of the masters of destruction and desolation.

196010.name: Feats of Panache
196010.description:
From publisher blurb:

The More Feats! PDFs introduce a single page of themed feats for use with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. Every PDF contains a full page of high-quality content (no fluff or filler)!

Feats of Lashing includes nine new feats for warriors of the whip and chain: Chain Bludgeon, Deadly Snap, Explorer's Whip, Improved Deadly Snap, Lasher's Gambit, Lashing Flourish, Lash Specialization, Slashing Lash, and Snap Steal.

196011.name: Prison Break (Pathfinder)
196011.description:
From publisher blurb:

Prison breaks provide almost limitless opportunities for adventure. However, few adventures feature prison breaks because they are problematic to flesh out. Designing all the prisoners and the many minor events the PCs witness would take more time to prepare than even the most diligent GM has at his disposal. That’s where Campaign Events: Prison Break comes in. Presenting copious notes on the prisoners themselves as well as minor events and dressing along with hooks, opportunities and complications it takes the hassle out of running a prison break and lets the GM concentrate on the important details of the campaign!

196012.name: Prison Break (System Neutral Edition)
196012.description:
From publisher blurb:

Prison breaks provide almost limitless opportunities for adventure. However, few adventures feature prison breaks because they are problematic to flesh out. Designing all the prisoners and the many minor events the PCs witness would take more time to prepare than even the most diligent GM has at his disposal. That’s where Campaign Events: Prison Break comes in. Presenting copious notes on the prisoners themselves as well as minor events and dressing along with hooks, opportunities and complications it takes the hassle out of running a prison break and lets the GM concentrate on the important details of the campaign!

196013.name: Blackwing
196013.description:
From publisher blurb:

She flies on wings of pure spite… Blackwing!

A Power Level 11 Rogue, Blackwing is empowered with a mysterious force that propels her through the air at hypersonic speeds! Blackwing is an iconic character in the Beacon City universe, but can be dropped into any campaign with very little alteration.

Blackwing’s file is designated "Gold" to indicate her powers are the result of genetic manipulation. A lifetime of aggressive competition led Blackwing to a fateful decision, a decision to be transformed into something more than human. She is master of a strange psionic field manifesting as a flaming black aura which increases her own vitality at the cost of her victims. Unable to accept even an unknowing rival, Blackwing will seek out those who seem faster than her and holds grudges against anyone who defeats her. She never forgives, and never forgets. Will your heroes be quick enough to take her down?

196014.name: Campaign Chunks Volume Nine
196014.description:
From publisher blurb:

Inside this volume you'll find:

Cookbook for Time Travellers - A novelty and popular cookbook
Easty Spiker - A serial killer that uses a rail spike on their victims
HMS Determination - This warship possess a potent and experimental engine
James Oak Dam - A dam made to protect a town
Kings Vintage Wine - A very popular type of wine
Lost Monastery - What happened to this monastery?
Music in the Woods - A music festival that is gaining in popularity
Stilton Stockcar Derby 5000 - A very popular yet long stock car race
Valley of the Kings - A location full of tombs and artefacts
Wrestling Academy - The Wrestling Academy is both promoter and organiser for Professional Wrestling matches in the region

196015.description: In Sinking Island, players are survivors of a shipwreck who have to a deserted island. Players must try to gather resources and find food on the small island to keep themselves alive. The player who manages to build the most useful tools and stay strong will stand the best chance to survive as a castaway!
196015.name: Sinking Island

196016.description: Acrylic overlay laser cut from 3mm cast acrylic to help control your cubes and facilitate game play.
boardgameaccessory: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization
196016.name: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization – Acrylic Overlay

196017.description: Cut from 5mm clear acrylic this coffee rack is made to augment our existing Wheelbarrow and Map location overlays. The extra height of the 5mm acrylic brings the overlay up to the height of the overlays + player mats and helps to keep the coffee tokens stable.
196017.name: Istanbul: Mocha & Baksheesh – Coffee Rack

196018.description: An acrylic overlay made from 3mm clear cast acrylic. This overlay is made to cover your Coffee House and facilitate gem setup. It holds the gems in place, keeping player movement and dice rolls from knocking gems out of place.
196018.name: Istanbul: Mocha & Baksheesh – Coffee Location Overlay

196020.name: Fear Equation
196020.description:
The world is covered in fog. Most who enter the fog disappear, and those who survive say it brings their nightmares to life.
No-one knows where it came from, but they all have ideas. Some say it's an experiment gone wrong, others say it's divine judgement. And you? All you know is that the Sun is rumored to shine just over the horizon.

You are The Engineer. You have designed the perfect system: a train, sealed off from the fog, ready to rescue survivors and take them to salvation.

If only they'd listen...

Manage up to 150 passengers, build defenses, upgrade the train, and optimize the engine's power, fuel and speed. Monitor your passengers' dream logs to discover what kind of horrors will attack the train. Send passengers out into the fog to investigate locations, find survivors and bring back supplies.

Source: The Game Website.

196021.name: Astral Breakers
196021.description:
User Summary

This simple Tetris Attack clone has you battle the 12 constellations to restore order in the cosmos.

196022.name: Leona's Tricky Adventures
196022.description:
LEONA’s Tricky Adventures is inspired by a clever puzzle game mechanic which was briefly explored in the very early 90s but sadly faded from prominence shortly after. The basic task is to match two increasingly complex patterns using increasingly complex mechanics. While it can’t be directly compared to any contemporary game the mental skills required by the puzzles put them somewhere in between "Picross" and "Bejeweled" – and in our humble opinion they can easily stand up against those games. LEONA’s Tricky Adventures is filled with hundreds of puzzles which provide many hours of fun gameplay - but unlike most puzzle games: No, it does not stop there!

We thought deeply about the frustrations that can arise in a puzzle game and took great care to make sure the game does not grind to a halt when a puzzle cannot be solved. All puzzles are embedded in a big and complex overworld full of exploration and humorous citizens constructed entirely using beautifully hand-drawn pixel graphics. Exploration and puzzle-solving is intertwined in clever and varied ways - finding out is part of the created new fun. The complexity of the overworld lies comfortably somewhere in between the overworld of "Super Mario World" and that of "A Link to the Past".

Source: The Game Website.

196023.name: Lord of the Dark Castle
196023.description:
Lord of the Dark Castle is a casual turn-based retro style rogue-like dungeon crawler with elements of strategy. Move/attack in Your turn, and the Monsters move/attack in their turn. Each level is randomized and will introduce new monsters as the Hero reaches deeper down into the dungeon. The game is played in Hardcore Mode, meaning no Save Game - death is permanent!

- Casual and Fast game play. Easy to get started, but challenging to beat! Have 20 minutes? Give it a go and hope for a good start with fat drops! Theoretically possible to beat the whole game within 2 hours, if you're a bit lucky and smart!

- This is STRATEGIC dungeon crawler - NOT a no-brain-dungeon-brawler! Casual does NOT mean easy! Normal mode is pretty difficult, and you may have to try many times before you win the game.

- Big replay value! A new game is a new experience. Level randomness, monster spawns and different skill choices makes up for lots of variety.

- Flat Skill Tree and LOTS of skills where no skill is dependent on any other. Each skill provides an important strategic advantage on its own.

- Every hit counts! Making a move that ends next to a monster will let the monster hit first!

- All monsters have unique strengths. An "ordinary thief" may even be worse than a dragon! (Yes... you will see...*evil*)

- The majority of monsters can wear EXACTLY what YOU can wear. If you drop something, they might pick it up and use it against you!

Source: The Developer Website.

196024.name: Nam (1998)
196024.description:
You are Alan ‘The Bear’ Westmoreland, Marine Corps sergeant. The trouble starts on a deadly Viet Cong raid. Here the jungle is your battleground.

Your mission, survive.

NAM captures all of intensity and paranoia of jungle warfare. Fire-fights, ambushes, booby-traps, snipers, air-strikes, anti-personnel mines AND MORE.

Feel the tropical heat and the fear of tunnel skirmishes, paddy killing fields, swamps and thick jungles.

Source: The Developer Website.

196025.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4
196025.description:
The story of NARUTO SHIPPUDEN is coming on new-gen!
The latest opus in the acclaimed STORM series is taking you on a colourful and breathtaking ride. Take advantage of the totally revamped battle system and prepare to dive into the most epic fights you’ve ever seen in the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja STORM series!

In NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja STORM 4, a broad set of Ninja Skills will be yours to use against the fiercest foes you’ll ever encounter. Massive attacks in the form of “Ultimate Jutsus”, energetic evolutions with the “Awakening”, the inimitable shurikens & kunais and a unique playstyle for each ninja! In versus mode, rebuild legendary or create dream teams, and take advantage of all your characters’ skills by switching during the fight, thanks to the Change Leader System. Stuck against the wall during a tense battle? Use it to your advantage, run on it and try to overcome your opponent! NARUTO SHIPPUDEN Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 will also feature an online mode where gamers from all-around the world will be able to duke it out, show their extensive Ninja toolkit and stand on top of the realm!
Those are only ones of numerous exciting features that will come out in the most awaited STORM game ever created!

Source: The Publisher Website.

196026.name: Cheese Quest
196026.description:
The Story
You’ve finally found a place to call home! There’s a safe space for the nest and plenty of cheese lying around. There are just two problems, you aren’t the only mouse here and, worse yet, a bunch of cats are roaming about. But it’s dinnertime and nothing’s going to stop you from getting that cheese!

Objective
Be crafty, strategic, and fast! You’ll need to split your time between progress and sabotage as you and the other mice race to be the first to return TWO cheeses to the nest.

196028.description:
This is the Theseus Promo card given out at the Festival international des jeux in Cannes (France - 2016), and in the Plato Magazine #84 (French boardgames magazine).

Theseus gives one additional legendary good per capital city controlled.

He completes the Daedalus Labyrinth triptych, with Ariane and the Minotaur - both KS exclusives.
196028.name: Mare Nostrum: Empires – Theseus Promo Card

196029.name: Magus (Issue 20 - Jun 1994)
196029.description:
Contents:

Pelinjohtajan apulainen
Satamaan saapunutta
Laivat ja pakolaiset
Arkiston kätköistä
Magic: the Gathering
Kuninkaan lapset
Kuolleiden muusikoiden seura
Miniatyyrit karsinoihin
Pelit soimaan
Kirjepalsta

196030.name: Magus (Issue 34 - Dec 1997)
196030.description:
Contents:

Maguksen mietteet
Elrondin jäljillä
Satamaan saapunutta
Esittelyssä: Gorkamorka
Esittelyssä: Dicemaster
Ei kaikki samaan muottiin
Yötä pimeämpi II
Kellokalle
Cthulhun ilmestys: Viimeiset ajat
Elävien kirjoissa
Farmzone
Kirjepalsta

196031.name: The Pioneers Program
boardgamepodcastepisode: 21. Devon Dice Explores Clank! Oceanos and the North sea
The First Roll - What's New on Kickstarter? - Episode 71: Friday, September 30th
The First Roll - What's New on Kickstarter? - Episode 72: Monday, October 3rd
The Polyhedron Collider Cast - UK Games Expo 2016
196031.description:
The Pioneers Program is a post-apocalyptic, town building board game for 3-6 players.

Players can plan, build, venture into the wastes or complete research on their harsh new world. Actions are limited and players need to choose wisely how to spend them. Each round players select a new survivor to help them, each brings their own strengths and selecting wisely is important, as is gaining turn order to allow you to choose sooner rather than later.

Grow too quickly and you may face unwanted attention. Balancing the size of your town with food production and defensive capabilities is essential and made all the more difficult by hordes of Viralz, the new race of ascendants or even a marauding gang of bikers.

196032.name: The Knights of the Lily
196032.description:
From the introduction:

The Order of the Lily, a secret society of noblemen, grew wary of the Project Safeguard and the Enforcers quite soon after the first announcement of it's intentions. The Order knew that eventually, the Project was doomed to fail. After all, how would people accept the authority of an organization who they had no influence at all?

After a long discussion, the Overseers of the Order decided to start preparing for the worst. They recruited some of the world's most talented people and began training them to counter the possible threat of the Enforcers.

Now, after a year of vigorous training, the Knights are ready to begin their mission: end the oppression of the Enforce and stop the Project Safeguard.

196033.name: The Knights of the Lily: Character Sheet
196033.description:
User summary:

This one-page print-and-play component is provided as a separate PDF download.

196034.name: Juiced Rider: Character Sheet
196034.description:
User summary:

The one-page character sheet was provided as a print-and-play accessory. It was made available as a separate download and, later, was bundled with the game in a ZIP archive.

196035.name: The Hero's Journey Fantasy Roleplaying
196035.description:
From publisher blurb:

"So you fancy yourself a hero? Well, it's a dangerous thing to set off into the wild places of the world, into the realm of legend. Dragons and monsters and worse await you. But if you've both blade and heart as strong as steel, then perhaps you might become a legend yourself - if you're willing to set off on The Hero's Journey."

The Hero's Journey Fantasy Roleplaying is a complete tabletop roleplaying game based on and compatible with Swords & Wizardry WhiteBox. It provides fourteen classes, a complete bestiary, rules for adventuring, with optional rules to help you tailor your gaming experience and tell the legendary stories that you've always imagined. All you need is this book, a few dice, and a stout heart.

Inside these pages you've find a information from previous supplements in the White Box line of products published by Barrel Rider Games that have been compiled, updated, streamlined and integrated with the material found in Swords & Wizardry WhiteBox to create a complete roleplaying game. This information has been packaged in a clean, visually appealing design to create a game with the options of fantasy gaming from the 1980s and 1990s while holding to the simplicity and flexibility of the early days of the hobby.

196036.name: Cylinder Habitat
196036.description:
From publisher blurb:

This product is a little booklet of a Traveller compatible space station. The station introduced in this installment of the series is a cylindrical habitat, part of which is spun to create artificial gravity on the otherwise Zero-G space station.

The PDF contains the background of the station, statistics for it and its crew. In addition the document contains an image depicting the station. This PDF contains NO deckplan!

196037.name: Creating New Armors
196037.description:
From publisher blurb:

For all the many armors, shields, and other defenses available in the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, every possible one hasn’t been fully covered. While you can just rename many existing defenses in a pinch to align with some new idea or specific cultural item, often times it is preferable to mix and match armor abilities and features into something new. But, how much would it cost? Would that make it light, medium, or heavy armor? What should it weigh? And can you be sure it won’t break your game? Creating New Armor provides guidelines for you to build, balance, and price new mundane shields and suits of light, medium, and heavy armor for your Pathfinder Roleplaying Game.

Extensively bookmarked for your convenience, Creating New Armors is an excellent way to bring new options to your table for all types of classes.

196038.name: Emil und die Detektive
196038.description:
The thief starts at the hotel and tries to reach the train station to win the game. The 6 kid detectives start at various spaces on the board and have to try to trap the thief so that he can't move. The kid detective who makes the last move to trap the thief wins the game. Movement is one space per turn.

Another version is called "Achtung! Feind hört mit", where the hunted game piece is a spy.

196039.name: Occult Feats II
196039.description:
From publisher blurb:

Occult Feats II is the second Mythic Mini devoted to exploring the weird word of the occult, from psychic spells to stranger tides on the mental and esoteric planes. If your character likes dabbling in the occult, she can explore new psychic specialties and mysteries of the mind with 10 new mythic feats from Spirit Sense and Psychic Maestro to Xenoglossy and Shatter Mental Mask!

196040.name: Microlite75 Extended Edition
196040.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Microlite75 Extended rules are based on three little booklets found in the boxed set of the 1974 original edition of the world’s most popular tabletop fantasy roleplaying game plus the supplements and other early published material. The rules are not intended to be a clone of the 0e rules, but rather a conversion of them to a rules-lite D20-based system that encourages old-school play without strictly old-school rules. Microlite75 Extended is based on the third edition of the original Microlite74 rules, modified to use advancement and experience systems closer to those of the original game and including many of the author’s house rules from the era and a large selection of optional rules.

Although the Microlite75 Extended rules are complete, they assume that the GM understands the basic concepts of D20-based roleplaying games. Information for both the GM and the players on the various “old school” styles of play is provided. Microlite75 games can easily use adventures and material from early editions of the world’s most popular tabletop fantasy roleplaying game or modern clones. Microlite75 Extended includes:

Simple Character Creation Rules: Roll 4 attributes and select a race, class, background, and alignment.
Standard Classes: Cleric, Druid, Fighter, Illusionist, Magic-User, Paladin, Ranger, Thief.
Optional Classes: Assassin, Barbarian, Bard, Monk, Mystic, Sorcerer, Warlord.
Backgrounds provide a simple and fast way to factor in a character's culture and non-class-related abilities.
Allegiances instead of (or in addition to) alignment.
Simple and fast-playing combat system that tracks physical damage (aka body points) separately from luck/skill/fatigue (aka hit point) damage.
Hit points recover with a night’s rest. Spells cost hit points to cast. Actual wounds recover more slowly.
Rules for hirelings; monster reactions (not every monster wants to fight); morale (not every monster fights to the death); dungeon, wilderness and ocean exploration; and more.
Optional Rules: Advantages and Disadvantages, Armor for Everyone, Weapon Mastery, Psionics, Sanity, Action Points, Traditional Systems, and many more.
A complete list of spells, monsters, and treasure.
Compatible with most other 0e based games and adventures.

196041.name: Leprechauns
196041.description:
From publisher blurb:

Now you can play as one of the most famous members of the "wee folk".

196042.name: Leprechauns for Basic Era Games
196042.description:
From publisher blurb:

Now you can play as one of the most famous members of the "wee folk".

Compatible with Basic Era, "Race as Class" games and retro-clones.

196043.name: Generian Legendat: Valontuojat
196043.description:
From publisher blurb:

Kuin sattuman oikusta salaperäinen tehtävänanto päätyy sankareiden käsiin. Kuulu maahiskeksijä von Krum uusine keksintöineen on kadonnut! Siinä alkusysäys eeppiselle seikkailulle läpi Generian valtavan luolamaailman. Ja eipä aikaakaan kun koko Generian kohtalo lepää sankareiden harteilla.

Translated:
By chance of luck the heroes get a mysterious quest. Famous gnomish inventor von Krum, with his newest inventions, has disappeared! There's the start for an epic adventure through the huge caveworld of Generia. And before long, the whole fate of Generia rests in the shoulders of the heroes.

196044.name: Waschi-Wurti
196044.description: The players try to form certain patterns (house, tower, pagoda, double pagoda)with their tiles on the board. They get points for completing their own patterns (Waschi) or for completing patterns of their opponent (Wurti). Tile placement and movement is controlled by dice. If the player rolls a black 1, 2 or 3 he may place or move the corresponding number of tiles. On the roll of a red 1 or 2 he may move 1 or 2 tiles of an opponent player. If he rolls the black dot, he has to skip a turn. The game ends when a player gets two Waschi or two Wurti.

196045.name: Blade and Brush
196045.description:
Blade and Brush is a simple yet intellectual game of shared storytelling through the medium of haiku.

Players take on the roles of unique, self-defined characters such as wandering monks, plucky adventurers, and questing warriors. Throughout the game, as the characters journey, they encounter a series of dilemmas. Using poems to solve problems, help people, and get into trouble, the players must collaborate and compete to weave the most entertaining story. The game can be played at a family gathering with children and grandparents over cups of warm tea, or at a late night gathering of close friends with a bottle of warm sake.

196046.name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons Forgotten Realms Limited Collector's Edition (Gold Box)
196046.description:
User Summary

A rare and less known compilation in the SSI Gold Box release containing the three Gold Box series games Pool of Radiance, Curse of the Azure Bonds and Secret of the Silver Blades

From the back of the box

Three of the greatest games in computer fantasy role-playing hostory - together! An incredible value!

When you want the very best in fantasy role-playing, the ADVANCED DUNGEONS & DRAGONS game system is it!
Now you hold three AD&D games that make up the greatest epic in computer FPR history. Prepare to enjoy hundreds of hours of the most intense adventuring in the exiting FORGOTTEN REALMS game world!

196047.name: Red Comrades Save the Galaxy: Reloaded
196047.description:
Red Comrades Save the Galaxy is a 1998 point-and-click graphic adventure game developed by S.K.I.F. and published by Buka Entertainment.

Gameplay:

Red Comrades Save the Galaxy is a 2D adventure game played from a third-person perspective. Via a point-and-click interface, the player guides three main characters — Pete, Vasily Ivanovich Chapaev and Anka through the game's world.

Main characters:

Vasily Ivanovich Chapaev — The division commander of Red Army. Commander in all respects. Legendary folk hero, easily recognized by anyone. No one knows how many times he participated in battles. It's usually said: «Someone like him doesn't burn or sink in the water!», although...

Pete — The brave Vasily Ivanovich's holder of an order. Despite the fact that he looks like a country-side fellow, with all his troubles he always off the hook.

Anna Maksimovna Unknown — She has perfect scouting skills, can eliminate terrorist and extremist groups. Prefers the latest models of arms and explosive weapons, have taken special courses... Help in any trouble..

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Comrades_Save_the_Galaxy Red Comrades Save the Galaxy]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

User Summary

Red Comrades Save the Galaxy was updated and rereleased on Windows, iOS and Android in 2016. Several updates were made to the game such as adding widescreen support and Steam trading cards and achievements, but the graphics and voice acting was kept the same.

196048.name: Peg Solitaire
196048.description:
User Summary

Players move pegs around a board by jumping one peg over another one, thus removing the peg that was jumped over. In this way they attempt to remove as many pegs from the board as they are able.

196049.name: FreezeME
196049.description:
Description:

FreezeME is a A 3D platformer in the style of the N64-era but wait there is a twist! “R” the main character, has one special tool – the camera around her neck. This camera allows her to literally freeze the objects she photographs.

The protagonist of FreezeMe is “R,” a brown-eyed moppet with a camera around her neck. R is hot on the trail of her best friend, “M,” who has been abducted by the dastardly Fat the Cat. Fat the Cat longs to create what he describes as a “Free-Dog-World,” and exactly how kidnapping M will help him with this goal remains something of a mystery, but R is determined to thwart him by rescuing M from his clutches.

To enter Fat the Cat’s isolated lair, where M is being held, R needs a special key. The key can only be forged from pieces of an ancient material, which are yellow cubes. As R collects the pieces of ancient material, she will unlock new areas, and ultimately find enough pieces to assemble the key and enter the final boss’s lair to save her friend.

History:

Walfrido came with the inspiration for the premise from observing his girlfriend “and her photography obsession – I mean, passion.” Developing of this game starter back in September 2012.

The developement started on XNA, but after 6 months Walfrido decided to move to Unity and develop the game fully on that engine. He hired a few freelancers for some modelling animation as well as the music.

The first playable alpha was released in August 2013. After that some older builds have been distributed to some specific people.
Features

4 vast worlds to explore.
Non linear progression.
Wide variety of different gameplay situations and mechanics.

Source: The Developer Website.

196050.name: Defragmented
196050.description:
About

Defragmented is a cyberpunk action-RPG by Dave Gedarovich and James Johnston of Glass Knuckle Games. Unravel a power struggle for the future of evolution through lightning-fast combat, unique character classes and a pulsing synth soundtrack. Welcome to Entropolis – New World, Bad Blood.

Source: The Developer Website.

196051.name: NotGTAV
196051.description:
NotGTAV is a ruthless Snake-like parody of GTAV set in the UK. Join us on a shonky, hand-drawn voyage across Britain’s green and pleasant lands. Play as Daffyd, Darren and British Prime Minister David Cameron in this satirical cult-hit game.

Source: The Developer Website.

196052.name: Invaders of the Lost Tomb
196052.description:
User Summary

In Invaders of the Lost Tomb (called Scarabaeus in Europe) there is aliens coming to a Egyptian tomb. The game contains three 3D maces seen in first person view. Your mission is to collect 9 hieroglyphs to open the elevators. There is also puzzles there you have to move hieroglyphs to different positions to open doors. You also need to find the Pharaoh's key to open the inner tomb.

196053.name: The Last Tinker: City of Colors
videogamehonor: 2014 Indie Prize Best in Show: Audience Choice Winner
2014 Indie Prize Best in Show: Critic's Choice Winner
196053.description:
In a world where creativity has given way to conflict, a young street kid living in the slums of Colortown seeks to restore the spark of imagination to his hometown. As Koru, you must harness the power of color to defeat the Bleakness and make Colortown vibrant once again.

A charming blend of modern platforming and multicolored style, The Last Tinker: City of Colors is a one-of-a-kind adventure.

Explore the beautifully handcrafted districts of Colortown with agile Koru in free-running fashion and meet quirky and charming creatures. Help the young boy Koru save Tinkerworld from the all-devouring Bleakness.

Use the powers of colors to aggravate (red), frighten (green) and grieve (blue) your enemies as you manipulate them to solve logical puzzles and overcome various obstacles. Return the colors to Tinkerworld in this tale about the power and beauty of imagination.

Source: The Developer Website.

196055.name: Kriegsunglück
196055.description:
User Summary

A text adventure by Andreas Mettler there the player is a soldier under World War II. When the soldier returns home, his wife has disappeared, and the mission is to find her.

196056.description:
This battle, which was made famous in Leo Tolstoy’s War and Peace, recreates the fight between French Imperial Prince Joachim Murat’s advance guard, having just taken Vienna from the Austrians, and the Russian rear guard led by General Peter Bagration, Bagration was desperately trying to buy enough time for Prince Mikhail Kutuzov to unite two separated parts of his large Russian-Austrian army in the maneuvering before the Battle of Austerlitz.
Murat has dallied for a few days after his capture of Vienna, trying to accomplish victory through diplomacy and trickery rather than force of arms, and the Russians used Murat’s vanity to keep the formerly hard-pressing French from catching the spread-out Russian forces in detail. The result is a small but sharp battle on November 16, 1805 which allowed the Russians enough time to unite their armies.

The game includes more than 100 counters, representing both the French Imperial forces and such leaders as Oudinot and Suchet; and the Russian rearguard represented by counters for Bagration; assorted Russian Cossacks, Austrian Hussars and Russian Jaegers. There are two 11 X17 maps, with much of the territory taken up by the extensive vineyards. The Schoengrabern Special Rules feature a La Bataille first: combat in the vineyards, which makes this game very different from any other La Bataille game. There is also a commemorative essay about Marshal Murat’s efforts and the battle itself.
196056.name: La Bataille de Schoengrabern 1805

196057.name: The Land of Magic Monarchy
196057.description:
User Summary

A text adventure by Stefan Wudy. In a fantasy world a evil wizard rules the land. The goal is the reach the wizard and find out a way to defeat him without be killed by his magic.

196058.name: Ooops! Noah is gone...
196058.description:
Are you ready for Finny and Leah’s action-packed adventure on Griffin Island? This exceptional endless runner lets you fling your favorite characters from one cannon to the next with simple one-tap controls.

A colorful, action-packed world awaits you. But careful! The longer your journey, the more challenging it will be to get the timing for the cannons right!

Play the coolest characters from the movie and test your reaction and timing skills. Collect pearls to level up – each level up will reward you with a treasure chest, containing puzzle pieces for new cannons.

Fling your character through a number of different lovingly detailed environments filled with fun playground equipment like swings, conveyor belts and trampolines. You will also meet Mr. and Mrs. Griffin, who have captured the prairie dogs, and teach them a lesson!

Source: The Developer Website.

196059.name: Logan Part 1: Beginn einer Odyssee
196059.description:
User Summary

The game is a text adventures with some kind of Wild West theme, were the player is an agent with an assistant called Roger. Planned to be the first part of a series of games (but the other parts were cancelled).

196060.name: Lords of Doom
196060.description:
User Summary

An icon driven point & click adventure game with animations, where the player controls four people at the same time and walks around in a town full of monsters.

196061.name: Ring Cycle
196061.description:
Back of the box

Deep in the land where legends are made, adventures are unfolding. The Rhinemaidens' gold has been stolen and forged into the supreme Ring of power. meanwhile, the gods are restless...

Ring Cycle is a Role Playing Adventure game that draws from Wagner's classic opera to provide the most powerful and evocative soundtrack ever heard as part of a gaming experience.

Teeming with bizarre characters and covering a massive gaming area with graphics that allow complete freedom of movement, Ring Cycle promises a rewarding and involving gaming experience.

196062.name: Time Wars: Supreme Command – Core Set: Humanity
boardgameimplementation: Time Wars: Supreme Command Premiere Core Set – Humanity
196062.description:
Arm your Time Travelers and duel for control over the Timeline. Stack the deck, bluff your foes, orchestrate your strategy, and take your chances as you take command in the TIME WARS.

Gather a Strike Team of Time Travelers. Arm them with high-tech weapons and tools. Duel for control over the lives and events in the Timeline. Achieve your Goals… or foil those of your foes. Bluff your opponents, and bide your time, waiting for the right moment to strike, and collapse the Timeline. As one version of the past crumbles into oblivion, another will rise in its place. The battlefield is history. The stakes the future. Which future will you fight for?

In Time Wars: Supreme Command, you will become the Supreme Commander of your own Time Corps. Assembling your Strike Team allows you to dictate the flow of history, so that it meets your Goals, or thwarts the attempts of your foe. Time is your only currency. Each turn, your one choice will make or break your strategy.

As the world’s first Deck Stacking Game, there are no discard piles in this card game. Instead, when something is discarded, you decide whether it goes on the bottom of your deck, or your opponent’s. Streamline your strategy by removing cards from your deck that you can’t use. But be careful, as everything you give up could be used against you.

Engage your opponents in deep strategy over and over again with a game that only takes minutes to learn and play. Two players can play right out of the box. With each additional Core Set, you can add another two players to the experience in team battles.

196063.name: Able Black
196063.description:
Able Black is a story experience that uses text, images and sound to guide you through a series of puzzles.
Able is a lonely android struggling with his Citizenship Exam, a test he must pass if he doesn’t want to be shut down. Follow Able as he searches for purpose and a way out of his situation. Discover the secrets of Ark 19, an underground habitat designed to save humanity from disaster. Find out why Able’s been left alone in the ark. Uncover what’s been hidden down there. Take the Citizenship Exam and discover who Able Black really is.
Able Black is part story, part game, and full of secrets.
Able Black is available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

Source: The Game Website.

196064.name: Red Scorpion
videogameversion: English/European Amstrad CPC (Bug-Byte re-release) Cassette edition
English/European ZX Spectrum (Bug-Byte re-release) Cassette edition
196064.description:
From the inlay:

The battle for the Bombyx Moons is about to start.

The Terran Confederation have a crack Star Commando Unit - all hand-picked soldiers whose motto is 'Glory or Death'.

Their job is to liberate the Bombyx people and stop the evil Necrons from mining the valuable mineral called Talanite.

196065.name: Train Conductor World
196065.description:
Train Conductor World is a high-speed train traversal puzzler; trundle, turn and track in this spectacular European adventure!

Conduct and control the tracks, manage movement and watch your rail network grow. You’ll need nerves of steel and snappy strategy to keep the chaos under control. Be on high-alert for explosive crashes, near-misses and split-second situations.

Adventure across new terrain and connect the wonders of the European continent. Your trains will be barreling across the canals of Amsterdam, zooming around the Arc De Triomphe in Paris and navigating the perilous peak of the Matterhorn.

Customise your trains to optimise your railway—use rocket boosters, star medallions and more to speed up your deliveries. It all counts when you’re growing the biggest railway in the world!
Features

International European landmarks lovingly created as in-game destinations
Customisation options available for the first time
Brand new rail-building world mode for players to explore
Crazy train conducting challenges based on new curving track designs
Dynamic weather system - all in-game weather events (eg. rain) are shared by all players
Flexible adjusting for gameplay difficulty to suit any skill level

Source: The Developer Website.

196066.name: Magische Steine
196066.description:
User Summary
A role playing game by Ralf Prescher. The game is seen from above, and you walk around in the fantasy land Tenomy with many monsters, and can visit towns, buy gears, and level up etc.

When you meet a monster there is a fight, generated by on-screen dice rolls (d6's). Hits and defence depends on your and the monsters weapon and armour. After a fight you will get gold and xp (rationen), and also see how many point you have left to the next level. In towns you can buy new items and weapondry. There is also dungeons to visit and a montain area. The aim of the game is to make Tenomy a free land.

196067.name: Mappa Mundorum
196067.description:
From the introduction:

To play Mappa Mundorum online, each player should have a separate blog. Ideally, they should be able to edit posts, allow signed and anonymous comments and screen comments temporarily. Also, they need access to the Map Generator software or a set of pre-generated maps.

User summary:

Each player controls three Agents and one Planet. Agents are defined only by location and a few changing values, though each Planet (Horus, Astarte, Earth, Baal, and Osiris) is well defined. All planets reside in a single solar system and the planetary orbits are significant. The author developed software to generate and print random solar systems but it was never completed - the rules offer a single map.

196068.name: Mechanical Primum Mobile, Ad Infinitum
196068.description:
User summary:

This game is based on standard Blackjack rules and uses one or more stripped packs of French playing cards shuffled into a single deck. Players take turns being the Mainframe (game master) and performing the deal (e.g., performing as the House). After each Exchange (round) the points of play are distributed to the players (but not the Mainframe). Play then passes to the exchange.

The points distributed are valued by suit and influence the humanity of the characters in the game. Players seek to balance points to retain their humanity, though they must trade off humanity to gain "Mechanism" which "transmogrifies" them into cyborgs. This involves a (brief) narrative development. Like the card game upon which it is based, this game is intended to be played in short periods of time and with rapid narrative development.

196069.name: Mission 1: Project Volcano
196069.description:
User Summary
A text adventure by Stewart Peart. The player is a secret agent, with special skills in computer operations, during the cold war. The aim of your mission is to gain entry to the hidden Command complex, once there you must locate the main computer room and delete the command program by entering the Distruct Code. A code that is hidden within the complex.

Back of box
Mission 1: Project Volcano is an advanced grapic game package. Each location visited will be displayed and your 'English like' instructions will be obeyed by the Program's Command Line Interpreter giving you the ability to interact with the program's enviroment in a sophisticated manner.

196070.name: Mission 2: Project Gibraltar
196070.description:
User Summary
A text adventure by Stewart Peart. The player is a secret agent, during the cold war. The agent is sent to a underground complex in Gibraltar to find a secret KGB agent.

Back of box
Mission 2: Project Gibraltar is an advanced grapic game package. Each location visited will be displayed and your 'English like' instructions will be obeyed by the Program's Command Line Interpreter giving you the ability to interact with the program's enviroment in a sophisticated manner.

196071.name: Prune
videogamehonor: 2015 AzPlay Awards Best Game Design Nominee
2015 AzPlay Awards Most Original Game Idea Nominee
2015 AzPlay Awards Most Re-Playable Game Nominee
2016 British Academy Game Awards Best Debut Game of the Year Nominee
2016 Game Developers Choice Awards Best Handheld/Mobile Game of the Year Nominee
196071.description:
Prune is a love letter to trees. A game about the beauty and joy of pruning. With a swipe of a finger, grow and shape each tree into a unique piece of art while avoiding the obstacles that confront you.

Source: The Developer Website.

196072.description:
Timeline: Korean History, a card game in Timeline series, consists of 110 cards that depict various historical events in Korean history. Each card has two identical sides, except that one of them shows the year that the particular event happened.

Players take turns placing a card from their hand in a row on the table. After placing the card, the player reveals the year on it. If the card was placed correctly with the year in chronological order with all other cards on the table, the card stays in place; otherwise, the card is removed from play and the player takes another card from the deck.

The first player to get rid of all their cards by placing them correctly wins. If multiple players go out in the same round, then everyone else is eliminated from play and each of those players are dealt one more card for another round of play. If only one player has no cards after a bonus round, that player wins; otherwise, play continues until a single player goes out.
196072.name: Timeline: Korean History

196073.name: HexGo
196073.description:
HexGo is played on a hexagon tiled by equilateral triangles.(see picture below) A corner of one of these triangles is called a "house". A side of one of these triangles is called a "street".

During the game, stones are placed on houses. Player-I places black stones, while player-II places white stones. The opening move should be decided by "swapping": one person decides where the opening move will go, and then his opponent chooses whether to make the opening move or not.

Linking Families

A "family" is a group of stones of the same color, such that you can travel along streets between any two stones in the group, without visiting an unoccupied house or an enemy stone.
Label the six sides of the hexagonal board as A, B, C, D, E, and F, in the clockwise order in which they appear, and group them in the following three pairs: A with B, C with D, E with F.

A family "links" one of these pairs, say A and B, if members of that family occupy a house on side A as well as a house on side B. Any houses inside the region surrounded by side A, side B, and a family linking A and B are "dominated" by that family.

Forbidden Moves

You may not place a stone on a house if it would be impossible to add more stones to the board to make the first stone part of a family linking one of the three pairs of sides, without removing some enemy stones. Also, you may not place a stone in any region dominated by an enemy family.

Capturing

If you make a move which blocks some enemy stones from linking any of the three pairs of sides, then those enemy stones are removed from the board. If you make a move which links any of the three pairs of sides, then any enemy stones in houses which are now dominated by some of your families are removed from the board.

End Game

"Territory" is defined this way: Each house occupied by one of your stones is included in your territory. An unoccupied house is included in your territory if it is not possible to travel along streets from that house to some enemy stone without first visiting one of your own stones.
Eventually, each player can only place stones within his own territory. Then the game is over. The winner is the player whose territory includes the most houses.

That's all!

HexGo was inspired by the classic games Hex, Go, Tanbo, and Star.

196074.name: 2D10 RPG
196074.description:
(publisher blurb)

The 2D10 Roleplaying Game is a fast, free, action-packed game system that comes in a single, stunning page of rules.

All you need to play are these rules, some ten-sided dice, and your imagination.

196076.name: Intrigue Onboard the Fleur-de-lis
196076.description:
From the introduction:

The year is 1773. A royally chartered French ship named the Fleur-de-lis is sailing the Indian Ocean heading south and is just about to cross the 45th Parallel. Captain Yves-Joseph de Kerguelen de Trémarec, a Breton adventurer and former privateer, commands the ship and is the appointed leader of this expedition. His second in command is Pierre Armand Baudin, First Mate of the Fleur-de-lis. A naturalist also joined them in the dangerous voyage: a young Picard scholar named Jean-Baptiste Pierre Antoine de Monet, Chevalier de la Marck (also known as "Lamarck").

At the onset of the game, the players themselves know next to nothing about the expedition’s goals, destination, planned route or just about anything else. As the game progresses, things will get even murkier in this regard, but sudden glimpses of understanding will reveal part of what’s happening behind the scenes – at least, until those "truths" are in turn discovered to be an intricate web of lies.

User summary:

The game is for exactly three players. Cards simulate random events. A die roll simulates individual fortune. Coins are used to track individual health and wellness.

196077.name: Land of Ill Harvest
196077.description:
User summary:

The game presents a post-apocalyptic setting though the exact nature of the event is not strongly defined. Three classes of hostile people are defined - The Mad, The Predators, and The Afraid. Typically The Afraid are humans. Also inimical to the characters is The Environment and The Wilderness. Finally, all of these are eclipsed by the Things from Outside. It would be up to the game master to specifically define these threats (if such definition is necessary to the game).

Characters have Methods (somewhat like Skills) and Motivations (Traits) with numeric values distributed from a point pool at creation. These values determine the number of dice in the pool associated with them. Characters usually will utilize two dice pools - an Active Pool and a Pain Pool. Opposed rolls align pool results from lowest to highest for comparison.

196078.name: Polaris Sector
196078.description:
The ancients who named this sector 'Polaris' sure had a unique sense of humor. Polaris - the bright star, the star of hope and faith. Well the Polaris sector has precious little of either; just a wilderness of gas, stars, and supernovas soaked in treachery, oppression, and the lust for power.

Fight for the Sector now!

Can anyone build an empire in a place like this? Other factions are naturally suspicious of newcomers and may wage war at the first sign of unidentified craft. Here, a natural death is an uncommon luxury. You look weak? Pirates and scavengers will plunder your planets. You show military strength to discourage potential enemies? Your rivals will combine their forces to eliminate the threat.

Total domination requires many diverse stratagems. Shaking the hand of a powerful emperor, designing new warships in secret, investing everything in fundamental sciences to gain technology before your competitors - all may be the road to success. But will you have the time to implement your strategy? Will you be visionary enough to build weapons and technologies that will make the difference in battles fought decades from now? Find the right balance between fundamental and applied sciences to stay ahead of the opposition. Find the right balance between classic designs and crazy prototypes and your ships will be feared across the galaxy. Your engineers and scientists provide you a high level of flexibility, but it’s your decisions that will shape the empire's fate.

Many a mercenary or adventurer has come here seeking wealth and power, and all their stories are now just whispers in the void. Polaris is a black hole for living species, and empires rise and fall in the blink of an eye. Maybe the leader that will bring stability to this zone hasn’t been born yet, if they will ever exist....

Source: The Game Website.

196079.name: Battlevoid: Harbinger
196079.description:
Battlestation: Harbinger is a hard sci-fi space exploration game blending roguelike, turn-based, star map strategy, and real-time space battles. You are a young commander given the task to venture out into enemy territories, far away from home to unknown galaxies, never knowing what you will face as you jump out from hyperspace. In Battlestation: Harbinger you will have to make decisions regarding your fleet and equipment, face surprising elements, and battle fiercely for survival as you defend humanity. Strategy, tactics, and resource management are the core of Battlestation : Harbinger. Plan your ship's offenses and defenses. Fortify your ships against enemy weapons, and wield them wisely. Lure your enemies into traps, or distract your foes with distress beacons.

Source: The Developer Website.

196080.description:
Carcassonne: Cathedrals in Germany is a mini-expansion of six tiles for Carcassonne with each tile featuring a well-known cathedral from Germany. If a meeple is placed as a thief on a road connected to a cathedral, then the thief earns double points for each road segment rather than for each tile. Alternatively, a meeple can be placed on the cathedral itself as a bishop, and if all of the roads connected to the cathedral have been finished before the end of the game, the bishop scores the player 1 point per road segment.

This expansion was first available during the Easter season (through April 3, 2016), from the Publisher's online store, then again in October 2016.
196080.name: Carcassonne: Cathedrals in Germany

196081.name: TURB
196081.description:
The mysterious star-Rai yon planet inhabited by animals, and "cat", "sheep" had been a war. Finally one day the planet whole area was trying to Ochiyo in the hands of the sheep army, machine gun boat to steer the hero "NonoRin" is crash landing in Rai yon planet. When NonoRin the notice, there was a city of the last bastion-Nekojo of cat army .......

"Sengoku TURB," said action RPG to start from such a story. As can be seen from the name "NonoRin", is a Gaiden game of that "TURB", it is possible to play with no problem or even if you do not know the "TURB". Players will To the hero phosphorus, we aim the suppression of sheep army as the savior of the cat army.

Game of the operation is carried out only with the mouse. Particularly with respect to the movement, that the hero in the direction towards the mouse cursor to move, a unique method of operation has been taken. This method of operation, would also were many players who remember the confusion at that time. But, it is strange because when accustomed come become to enjoy a sense of this strange operation.

Source: The Game Website.

196082.description: Juna is a new heroine for Legends of Andor, and her special feature is that you can design her by yourself. You decide which special ability and color she has.
boardgameaccessory: Legends of Andor: Journey to the North
Legends of Andor: The Star Shield
196082.name: Legends of Andor: Juna

196083.name: Sengoku TURB
196083.description:
User Summary
After reading various reviews
After crash landing on the planet Lion, the intergalactic bounty hunter, Jino-Chan, realise that the planet is in war between Sheep and Cat, and Jino-Chan decide to interfere.

The battles are in a 3D open world envoiment, and battles are a bit different from most RPGs, as you have a more strategic view of it; Jino-Chan is having her own little squad of soldiers, whom she have to place for the battles.

This game seems to only have been published in Japan, and is a new, redesigned edition of the old Bio_100% developed TURB

196084.name: Sengoku Turb: Fanfan I love me Dunce-doubletendre
196084.description:
User Summary
Follow up of Sengoku Turb, which basically is a collection of mini-games in the TURB universe, allowing up to four players take part in the fun

196085.name: A Walk in the Dark
196085.description:
A world so big, a cat so small…
“Arielle and her cat, Bast, are spending a pleasant afternoon in the forest.
Bast, free from the usual four walls of their home, can't stay in one place. He runs around, playing with everything that moves. In his haste to enjoy everything, he ends up getting away from Arielle.
He hears her calling for him, but the forest is such an interesting place. There are so many things, so much space. Some little creatures challenge him. Bast pursues them. It feels great to run in the forest.
He is about to catch one of them. He jumps to grab it but misses. He falls on top of some old stones. Something breaks under him. A cold breeze ruffles the trees chilling him to the bones. A smoke rises forming a shadow. Someone, something, hovers above him. Some ancient foul-smelling thing that nails him to the ground. Bast is unable to move.
Nearby, Arielle calls for him. The thing, the Spirit, turns around. As Arielle comes closer, the Spirit flies in her direction and envelops her. Bast hears the muffled screams of Arielle. They grow fainter as the spirit disappears in the forest.
Bast is alone. The sounds of the night emphasize that feeling. Arielle is gone and it’s his own fault. He realizes that the once pleasant forest has become a strange and dark place.
He starts running hoping to help her. He fears it might be too late.”

And so it starts…

A Walk in the Dark is an indie game being developed for PC.
In this action platformer you play as a cat, Bast, running through a dark fantasy world. You’ll be running, jumping and sliding with smooth and precise controls designed to make you feel like a cat. But it wont be easy. In the dark you never know what lies in the shadows. In this dark journey you will face strange creatures and dangerous traps.
Features:

A story driven platformer set in a dark fantasy world.
Fluid controls and animations: play as a cat, move like one.
Challenging levels set in a dark, strange and dangerous world.
Gravity inversion mechanics that will test your skills and ability to adapt to new gameplay.
Beautiful original soundtrack by Cody Cook




Source: The Game Website.

196086.name: Finalty
196086.description:
In this work, which was announced as a sequel of "SuperDepth", Battleship mountain Bok starting the fighter from (Yamaboku) "Finalty" has become a leading role, mission that reject the hostile forces that have been turned to fight back. And a capsule-type power-up system that has been inherited from the previous work, while leveraging the bomb with the invincible time, so that the aim of the excitement of the ending again.

The game system is completely changed with the rattle, because the reborn as a side-scrolling shooter orthodox, rather than a handy play in spare time, while remember the enemy's appearance pattern and the boss of the attack pattern, sit down carefully attitude to challenge the play on is desirable. So to speak, because it was less likely to depend on the luck of the element, it is that his own reflexes than ever in previous work began to say things. But as the genuine gamer, I wonder more of these shooting is not the more the blood fuss.

Source: The Game Website.

196087.name: FLIXX
196087.description:
"FLIXX" is, the character of the game "mogler" in the same metys Mr. production has appeared, is the second installment of mogler series.

Simple but Kiwamarinai rules that apply to mogler skipping the disk, but this method of operation is unique. Move the mouse to slide the Tsuu' is to fly a disc. Momentum to fly the disk is proportional to the speed at which you move the mouse (upper limit but there is). Flying go direction, skipping the disk while the momentum is adjusted with the mouse, it can be caused to hit the impressive mogler proceed to the next surface. But the game is over when the hand of the disk is lost.

Source: The Publisher Website.

196088.name: Metys's Snow Wars
196088.description:
Metys's Snow Wars was a snowball fight to the subject, it is a comical action game side-scrolling type.

Hero is a key member of Bio_100% that metys. Players dressed in this metys, but he will be out on an adventure to help the kidnapped sister, even enemy characters that prevent a way that appeared in the earlier, he a whopping all Bio_100% of members who. Just stepping Bio All-Star uniform, would say that Bio_100% fan if play essential game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

196089.name: Heroes of Renown
196089.description:
Heroes of Renown is a tile exploration game where each tile has a special action that can be used to gain valuable supplies, money or other special actions.

Along the way you will need to fight off other heroes and neutral minions that are after the same actions.

You will need your supplies to construct powerful weapons and complete quests to become the most powerful hero.

Each combat you enter has the chance to reward you victory points and experience points which will raise your hero to a stronger level.

Every quest and weapon you complete will also gain you victory points and bonus actions.

196090.name: POY
196090.description:
"POY" is, "mogler" is a mogler third series following "FLIXX". That only put the leaves throwing mogler, in previous work the same simple rules, the operation is of course mouse. When you move the mouse while holding down the left button, so the disk can be pulled in as rubber, when you release the button from the pull to some extent, mogler that was hit by a disk goes flying in the sky. Thus it becomes a success if Rarere put mogler on top of the spectacular leaves.

Of the hand five mogler, it can be Rarere placed on the 3 pieces of leaves proceeds to the next stage. Since the leaves flowing through the surface of the water is always moving, distance, angle, that the timing and throwing mogler on was thoroughly calculated is important.

Source: The Publisher Website.

196091.name: Owl-Zoo
196091.description:
Gangaia continent humans and demons is, coexist peacefully without hostility. But one day, a demon who lives in the underground is, caused the war to try all of the ground to those of their own. So human army, will be Semekomu the labyrinth that dwells demon in a small fighter "Owl-Zoo", was of the strategy is 4 warriors volunteered

"Owl-Zoo" is a vertical scrolling shooter that starts from such a story. In this as in the story, but he becomes the start of the game select the pilot from among the four warriors, Uchikata of each is its own equipment to manipulate the pilot shot is different. Or be divided extensively shot, etc. or can shoot concentrated in one direction, have their own shots are provided by the pilot, it can be selected pilot that matches the taste. If sometimes play in the unusual pilot, you will also enjoy the fun different.

Stage have been prepared 8 faces in total, it is possible to proceed to the next stage if defeat the boss characters that wait in the wings at the end of each stage.

Source: The Publisher Website.

196092.name: Car II GRAND PRIX
196092.description:
2D vertical scrolling racing game of the type overlooking from above. Car of the operation in the radio control sense, rather than put the key in the direction you want to proceed, has become a method of operation to enter the right or left depending on whether you want the bending to either of the vehicle body.

Courses are eight types available, time-over to be able to goal within the time limit of each of 2 minutes. Also firmly store the course layout in and ran a number of times, we must by cutting the time in a precise machine control.

Source: The Developer Website.

196093.name: Dada
196093.description:
Once also hero of legend who saved the city from the darkness with the power of the holy light, now forgotten from those who had sent a boring every day in the city became completely peace ....... "The Melancholy of a hero" is a text adventure game where the player has to advance the story on behalf of such a hero.

During the game is also the choice of behavior many times is required, Yes or No, if the input and direction to go, automatically story progresses. Sometimes there is also be prompted for a specific string, almost'm okay with only the choice of Yes or No. Thus games proceeds tempo well crunchy, so that will change greatly the fate of the hero in this casual selection. By how to proceed with the story, it is also of ending more than 40 are available for this game.

Source: The Developer Website.

Japanese name: ある勇者の憂鬱

196094.name: Fermi's Path
196094.description:
In this action-loaded arcade game you play the role of Fermi, a particle on a terrific trip through subatomic space. Driven by the music you have to avoid obstacles and eliminate incoming particles on ever-accelerating levels to crack the top score!

Source: The Game Website.

196095.name: Polestar
196095.description:
By operating the sports car, a pseudo-3D of the driving game that aims to finish within the time limit. Particularly complex operation without the need for, and has a clear-cut rule that rip earnestly only in steering and accelerator and the brake.

Course where you can enjoy a drive in the arcade sensation has been prepared two types, each made up of four stages. Must be 4 laps the provisions of the route within the time limit to clear the first stage, in the case of time-out game is over. Because it is also available TIME ATTACK mode that each stage can be played individually, Yoshi also be used to preview the course, it is good also earnestly ran to aim the fastest time.

Source: The Developer Website.

196096.name: Zone 22
196096.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.




User Summary

Zone 22 is a first person game set in an alternative, dystopian universe where the Nazis conquered the world during World War 2. You as the player are a part of the society of Zone 22, where everyday is about surviving, by behaving, working and eating. Or you can rebel against this tyrannic foe and save the humanity.

196097.name: Heroes of Legionwood - Episode 1: Age of Darkness
196097.description:
Heroes of Legionwood is a classical style fantasy RPG set in a world on the brink of annihilation. It is the third exciting instalment in the epic Legionwood saga.

It has been 100 years since the world ended. Human civilization has been devastated by a malevolent force known only as the Darkness and only the last remnants of humanity remain. Playing the role of Locke, a young adventurer determined to save his people, you'll discover a world where your choices have consequences and every victory comes with a price. Can you stop the Darkness, or will you perish along with the rest of society, never to be heard from again?

Source: The Developer Website.

196098.name: Heroes of Legionwood - Episode 2: Resurrection
196098.description:
Heroes of Legionwood: Resurrection is the epic second chapter of the Heroes of Legionwood saga.

The last thing you remember is blackness... death. And now, suddenly, your soul has returned from the Weave. You have been saved from the brink of oblivion by an unlikely ally.
After your fight against the forces of the malevolent Darkness in Age of Darkness, you now find yourself in Port Alexis, a sprawling metropolis straining under the threat of destruction. As you search for answers you'll become caught up in the bloody war that is tearing the city apart and it is up to you to pick a side and determine the ultimate fate of Port Alexis and everyone within.

Features
⦁ Import your character from Age of Darkness or begin again with a new level 10 character
⦁ Discover the consequences of the choices you made in Age of Darkness, and make new ones!
⦁ Separate quest paths for either of the city's factions
⦁ New skills to learn and a brand new tier of equipment to master
⦁ Continue the epic story of Heroes of Legionwood and set the stage for the final conflict with the Darkness

Source: The Developer Website.

196099.name: Tomb of the Mask
196099.description:
Tomb of the Mask is an arcade game, which takes place in an infinite procedurally generated vertical labyrinth. Seeking for adventure you get into a tomb, where you find a strange mask. You wear it and suddenly realize that you can now climb walls — easily and promptly. And that’s when all the fun begins.

Source: The Developer Website.

196100.name: Sufferhorn Castle (5E)
196100.description:
From publisher blurb:

A 5th Edition compatible adventure for four PCs of Levels 2-3

Mosshammer Castle has been seized by Sufferhorn orcs! The former occupants of the castle are missing, most likely slain by the orcs during the violent attack. Could the movement of the orcs into human territory herald a coming orc horde and the surging tides of war? If the castle is not reclaimed the nearby towns and villages could be overrun when orc reinforcements arrive. The PCs are called upon to retake the castle, now dubbed “Sufferhorn Castle” by the occupying orcs. The mission will not be easy; the PCs must storm a castle, figure out how to get inside, and slay the leader of the Sufferhorn Orcs, the dreaded Dolaken Boarhut.

Also included in “Sufferhorn Castle”:

Cartography by Jonathan G. Nelson
Sufferhorn Orc lore by Scott Ackerland
New Magical Item: Book of Striking Good Looks
New Monster: Mosshammer Skeletal Soldiers
Three New Traps by Rory Toma of Trap-a-day
Two bonus short side quests including a treasure map

196101.name: Pokémon GO
videogamehonor: 2016 Global Game Awards Best Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2016 Golden Geek Best Mobile/Handheld Video Game Runner Up
2016 Golden Geek Most Innovative Video Game Winner
2016 Golden Joystick Best Game Innovation of the Year Winner
2016 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2016 Golden Joystick Game of the Year Nominee
2016 The Game Awards Best Family Game of the Year Winner
2016 The Game Awards Best Mobile/Handheld Game of the Year Winner
2017 British Academy Game Awards Best Family/Children's Game of the Year Nominee
2017 British Academy Game Awards Best Handheld/Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2017 British Academy Game Awards Best Innovation of the Year Nominee
2017 D.I.C.E. Best Cellular/Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2017 D.I.C.E. Game of the Year Nominee
2017 Game Developers Choice Awards Best Handheld/Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2017 Game Developers Choice Awards Best Innovation of the Year Nominee
2017 Game Developers Choice Awards Best Technology of the Year Honorable Mention
2017 Game Developers Choice Awards Best VR/AR Game of the Year Nominee
2017 SXSW Best Mobile Game of the Year Winner
2017 SXSW Best Technical Advancement of the Year Nominee
196101.description:
User summary

Pokémon GO is an enhanced reality treasure hunting game where the players walk around in the real world to reach certain points on the map where the game has stored treasures… and Pokémon. While just walking around and collecting things is one of the attractions, the players also compete (in global teams) to "take control" of bases – or, as they are called, "Gyms".

There are roughly three types of possible encounters when walking around with Pokémon GO – Pokéstops, Gyms and Pokémon. Those already visible on the map when you turn the game on, are the Gyms and Pokéstops. Both of these are all based around noticable landmarks in the real world, like a church, a monument or a statue. Pokéstops are most common. Walking up to a Pokéstop and flicking the screen rewards the player with Pokéballs, or sometimes other useful items such as healing potions, eggs or revival crystals. A "Gym" is essentially a base that can be taken.

Pokémon do not show up on the screen until the player is very close, although the game gives hints on what kind of Pokémon are close by. When a Pokémon shows up, a tap on the screen will start the catching seqence, where the player flicks his Pokéballs against the creature (which shows up on the mobile device's camera).

As the player checks Pokéstops and catches Pokémon, he gains experience points. At a certain level, the player can start entering the Gyms, and partake in the battle to control them. The player is asked to join one of three teams, represented by Yellow, Red or Blue. All Gyms are coloured after what team currently controls it. A player can use his Pokémon(s) to fight the current Pokémon(s) on the base, regardless of whether it's a friendly or enemy base, but the rules differ.

When fighting a friendly base, the player challenges the Pokémon(s) there with one of his creatures. If he defeats any of them, the base gains points. The base can thus level up: A level 1 base has room for only one (1) Pokémon, a level 2 base has room for two, and so on, although each player can only keep one of his Pokémons och eash base (Gym). So the more a player challenges his own team's base, the stronger it becomes, as he can create room for more Pokémons to defend it.

When fighting an enemy base, the player challenges the Pokémons there with six (6) of his creatures. If he defeats all, he has won the base, and it returns to neutral level 1. The player can then claim the base by placing one (1) of his own Pokémon there (this Pokémon will remain there until kicked out). However, if he defeats at least a few of the enemy Pokémon but not all, the base loses points, and if it levels down, the lowest Pokémon is kicked out of the base.

If a player repeatedely attacks a base, he can thus chip off the Pokémons there and will eventually be attacking with six Pokémon against the last one. This allows a lone player with several slightly weaker Pokémons (but a lot of healing potions) to actually defeat a base, even if the Pokémon(s) there are a bit stronger.

When caught, Pokémons are assigned a semi-random strength, slightly depending on the level of the player. Catching a Pokémon also gains the player food for that Pokémon type. A Pokémon can be powered up, or evolved, using food for its type. Duplicate Pokémon can be turned in for extra food, to save up to evolve the strongest Pokémon of that type the player has.

196102.name: TransPlan
196102.description:
Transport a payload to its destination, using the laws of physics and a few simple tools! TransPlan features over 75 levels of increasingly complex puzzle solving!

Create ramps and catapults, watch objects tumble and fall, and someway... somehow reach the destination. Each project is a hand-drawn puzzle for you to interact with. Devise a plan, experiment, and make it happen!

TransPlan features dozens of projects to explore, starting simple and growing ever more complex. Unlock later puzzles and categories by completing earlier ones, and finish projects on-budget to earn hints to help you later on. TransPlan fully supports achievements and cloud saves so your progress will stay with you anywhere!

Source: The Developer Website.

196103.name: Amber Waves of Grain
196103.description:
Variant Setting for Goldenfields, the Breadbasket of the North

From the introduction:

This material provides a city setting, story plot hooks, and NPCs intended for use in any Forgotten Realms campaign as a supplementary resource but specifically Princes of the Apocalypse.
